title: Fortune Quest L (Fortune Quest)
synopsis: Our story is set in another world, parallel to ours. We meet Pastel, an orphan girl, 18 years old, who lives with a group of adventurers in a small house. Pastel works as a writer and also a "mapper", charting towns, the countryside, rivers and mountains with sketches and illustrations.
related_anime: ['Fortune Quest: Yo ni mo Shiawase na Boukensha-tachi']
voices: ['Kasai, Ritsuko', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Ishimura, Tomoko', 'Onishi, Takeharu', 'Takato, Yasuhiro', 'Iwanaga, Tetsuya', 'Nakagawa, Akiko', 'Madono, Mitsuaki']
